short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Pivotal story type options ie Feature, Bug, replaced with analogous terms for the non-software side of the rescue.co team of heroes.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
At rescue.co, we are software developers (using pivotal) and we have other operational functions. There's little overlap, but at this team size, it doesn't make sense to have separate workflows and work management tools. In order to help get our non-technical (operations) team members onto pivotal, this plugin replaces terms familiar to developers with analogous ops terms. This is the first pass at this idea, so not sure if I recommend it but feel free to borrow, replicate, distribute, and modify, license enclosed. 

How it works: We're replacing the story types of feature, bug, chore, and release with the analogous types of stories outside of the software development (as we see it in our context): Feature --> Initiative or project work, Bug --> Unplanned but important iteration or last minute client request, Chore --> Chore or operational BAU (Business as Usual), and Release --> Milestone or Release. We've also changed "Epics" to "Initiatives (Epics)".

The main value will be to be able to track metrics across all teams, software, operational, and others to see overall progress, productivity metrics, etc.
